inappropriateIllegalContent.type: Clinical library content (standard rehabilitation exercises, information and education material, questionnaires). See: https://library.opentelerehab.com/
inappropriateIllegalContent.illegalContentDetectionMechanism: Yes, public contributions to the library are subject for moderator approval.  Clinical content from the global library is controlled by owner. Only users properly given access can add content.  No: Custom therapist content is not monitored  Chat and calls are not monitored.

stepsAddressRiskPreventSafetyUnderageUse: Yes and No: Access governed by healthcare provider privileges. Only the patients registered by their healthcare provider can access the service.
harassmentProtectionSteps: Yes: Healthcare providers must agree with the terms and conditions, mentionning "If you are a healthcare provider, you accept and agree that you are responsible for compliance with all applicable privacy legislation as the healthcare provider to the patient and no acts or omissions by the Application shall relieve you of your obligations.  You are fully and exclusively responsible for ensuring compliance with these obligations; including taking regular back-ups of patient information in a form required by relevant legislation, rules and code of practice that apply to you as a healthcare provider." No: no abuse reporting mechanism available.
